response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die privatsphäre in zeitalter von big data und social media geschützt ist? es ist zeit, dass wir uns wieder für unsere datenrechte einsetzen und die konzerne dazu bringen, unsere persönlichen informationen zu schützen. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #bigdata"

translation:

"how can we still talk about protecting privacy in the age of big data and social media? it's time for us to stand up for our data rights and force corporations to protect our personal information. #dataprotection #privacy #bigdata"

this post critically examines the current state of data privacy in the digital age, questioning how well personal information is actually being protected when there is so much data being collected and shared. it calls for individuals to take action and demand that corporations do more to safeguard their personal data. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #bigdata highlight the topic and reach a wider audience on twitter.
